name: Killing Heat
description:
In a particularly hot summer in the 1990s, in a Japanese village, a girl starts to work at her aunt’s inn. When people of the village start dying, her friend insists that they investigate. 

This game was made for the June/July Jackpot Jam.

Since the jam had only two weeks, this version is still not the best it could be. Might release updates in the future.

All music made by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) and sounds by Mike Koenig (soundbible.com). Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0.
